text: Ye pabitrasatta tomadera jan'ya bhumike bichana ebam akasake chada sbarupa sthapana kare diyechena, ara akasa theke pani barsana kare tomadera jan'ya phala-phasala utpadana karechena tomadera khadya hisabe. Ata'eba, allahara sathe tomara an'ya kake'o samakaksa karo na. Bastutah esaba tomara jana.
